title: Which organization is currently leading the Strong AI development? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi, I’d say it’s Tesla, through their highly productive algorithms AI technology on their cars. Tesla’s map function already beats Google’s MAP out, as the data is automatically collected through Tesla drivers’ route tracking. Cheers!

NEW YORK, NY., SEPTEMBER 9, 2020 – Voyager Labs, a world leader in the Artificial Intelligence space, announced today that it has been selected as the winner of “Best AI Industry Solution for Intelligence” in the 2020 AI Breakthrough Awards program conducted by AI Breakthrough, a leading market intelligence ...Sep 9, 2020
